issue.title: Gazebo exiting on simulation machine in the cloud

content.raw:
I also left `vrc_task_1.launch` running with the car driving in circles and Atlas seated (pinned and unpinned) overnight, but not able to reproduce a crash.

@sachih: were you doing anything else to the robot at the same time?  Can you check `/var/log/kern.log` to see if there's any error at the time of crash too?
content.html:
I also left vrc_task_1.launch running with the car driving in circles and Atlas seated (pinned and unpinned) overnight, but not able to reproduce a crash.

@sachih: were you doing anything else to the robot at the same time? Can you check /var/log/kern.log to see if there's any error at the time of crash too?
